FILTERS.SESSOION_PROPERTIES_HINT:
QQOUser, Client, Account User Name, Account Address, Account Policy ID, TicketID and more.

To search by multiple properties in the same session separate them with a space, for example: root 192.168.0.1

Use quotes to search for phrases
FILTERS.COMMANDS_AND_EVENTS_HINT:
QQOWindows Titles, SQL Commands, SSH Commands, SCP Commands, Keystrokes, Blocked commands (use the "DENIED" keyword).

To search by multiple activities in the same session separate them with a space, for example: sudo rm.

Use quotes to search for a phrases, for example: "ifConfig -a"

ONBOARDING_RULES.NO_RULES_FOUND: QQOThere are no Rules to show

DELETE_RULE.FEEDBACK_DESCRIPTION: QQOAre you sure you want to delete '{RULE_NAME}' rule?

ORIGINAL_EVENTS.ORIGINAL_EVENT_SOURCE_TARGET: QQOOriginal event occurred {{originTime}} from source {{source}} on target {{target}}.
ORIGINAL_EVENTS.ORIGINAL_EVENT_SOURCE_DC: QQOOriginal event occurred {{originTime}} from source {{ source}} on DC {{target}}.

ACTIVE_DORMANT.TITLE: QQOActive dormant user
ACTIVE_DORMANT.SUBTITLE_SINGLE_ACCOUNT: QQOVault user {{user}} retrieved the password of account {{account}} from CyberArk PAS after being inactive for more than {{inactiveDays}} days.
ACTIVE_DORMANT.SUBTITLE_MULTI_ACCOUNTS: QQOVault user {{user}} retrieved the password of {{numOfAccounts}} accounts from CyberArk PAS after being inactive for more than {{inactiveDays}} days.
ACTIVE_DORMANT.RECOMMENDATION: QQOMake sure that this Vault user is active, and if not, consider limiting the user's access.

AGGREGATIVE_ICE.TITLE: QQOAnomalous access to multiple machines
AGGREGATIVE_ICE.SUBTITLE:
QQOAccount {{account}} connected to a large number of new machines, which is unusual for this account.
These actions could indicate that the credentials of {{account}} have been abused for lateral movement.
AGGREGATIVE_ICE.RECOMMENDATION: QQOAssess the potential damage and look for IOC:
AGGREGATIVE_ICE.RECOMMENDATION_SUGGESTION_1: QQOReview the accounts that have active sessions on the target machines
AGGREGATIVE_ICE.RECOMMENDATION_SUGGESTION_2: QQOReview the credentials stored on the target machines
AGGREGATIVE_ICE.RECOMMENDATION_SUGGESTION_3: QQOLook for other attack indications on the target machines

DUAL_USAGE.TITLE: QQOService Account logged on interactively
DUAL_USAGE.SUBTITLE_SINGLE_MACHINE: QQOService account {{account}} interactively logged on to {{target}} machine.
DUAL_USAGE.SUBTITLE_MULTI_MACHINES: QQOService account {{account}} interactively logged on to {{numOfMachines}} machines.
DUAL_USAGE.RECOMMENDATION: QQOSeparate between using your service accounts and human accounts.

GOLDEN_TICKET.TITLE: QQOGolden Ticket attack
GOLDEN_TICKET.SUBTITLE:
QQOA Golden Ticket attack was detected in domain {{domain}}. The attacker used a forged Kerberos ticket for account {{account}} on machine {{target}}.
This ticket originated from machine {{source}}.
GOLDEN_TICKET.RECOMMENDATION: QQOAn attacker has compromised your domain. Carefully investigate your environment and take action to contain the attacker.

IRREGULAR_HOUR_USER.TITLE: QQOPrivileged access to the Vault during irregular hours
IRREGULAR_HOUR_USER.SUBTITLE:
QQOVault user {{user}} retrieved the password of privileged user {{account}} on machine {{target}} at {{startTime}}.
This action was flagged as a security event because {{user}} normally does not connect at this time.
IRREGULAR_HOUR_USER.RECOMMENDATION: QQOReview this Vault user’s activities and ensure that they are valid.

MALICIOUS_RETRIEVAL.TITLE: QQOMalicious Retrieval of Domain Accounts
MALICIOUS_RETRIEVAL.SUBTITLE_ONE_OCCURRENCE:
QQO A potentially malicious retrieval of credentials from domain controller {{target}}, was detected on machine {{source}}.
The credentials retrieval was conducted by a successful domain controller replication.
MALICIOUS_RETRIEVAL.SUBTITLE_MULTI_OCCURRENCES:
QQOMultiple potentially malicious retrievals of credentials were detected on machine {{source}}.
The credentials retrieval was conducted by a successful domain controller replication.
MALICIOUS_RETRIEVAL.RECOMMENDATION:
QQOA Domain controller replication request (DCSync) must be initiated only by domain controllers.
If another authentication or management service in your network also executes domain controller replication,
it is highly recommended to protect these services at the same level as domain controllers.

OVER_PASS_THE_HASH.TITLE: QQOOverPass the Hash attack
OVER_PASS_THE_HASH.SUBTITLE:
QQOAn Overpass the Hash attack was detected in domain {{domain}}, which originated from machine {{source}}.
The attack abuses the credentials of account {{account}}.

PAC_ATTACK.TITLE: QQOPAC Attack
PAC_ATTACK.SUBTITLE:
QQOA PAC Attack (MS14-068 exploitation) attempt was detected in domain {{domain}}, which originated from machine {{source}}.
The attacker attempted to elevate the privileges of account {{account}}.
PAC_ATTACK.RECOMMENDATION: QQOMake sure that Domain Controller {{target}} is updated with patch KB3011780.

RISKY_COMMAND.TITLE: QQOSuspicious activities detected in a privileged session
RISKY_COMMAND.SUBTITLE:
QQOSuspicious session activities on {{target}} were detected in a privileged session.
The session was initiated by Vault user {{user}} with account {{account}}.
RISKY_COMMAND.RECOMMENDATION_LIVE:
QQOReview each of the security events associated with the session and evaluate whether a response,
such as live monitoring or a manual termination of the in-progress session, is required.
RISKY_COMMAND.RECOMMENDATION_NON_LIVE: QQOReview each of the security events associated with the session and assess the risk by reviewing the session's audit and recording.

SCT.TITLE: QQOSuspected credentials theft
SCT.SUBTITLE_SINGLE_MACHINE: QQOPrivileged account {{account}} accessed {{target}} machine with a password that was not retrieved from CyberArk PAS.
SCT.SUBTITLE_MULTI_MACHINES: QQOPrivileged account {{account}} accessed {{numOfMachines}} machines with a password that was not retrieved from CyberArk PAS.
SCT.RECOMMENDATION: QQOConsider changing the passwords that were used without being retrieved.

UNMANAGED.TITLE: QQOUnmanaged privileged account
UNMANAGED.SUBTITLE_SINGLE_MACHINE: QQOPrivileged account {{account}} was used to access {{target}}, although this account is not managed in CyberArk PAS.
UNMANAGED.SUBTITLE_MULTI_MACHINES: QQOPrivileged account {{account}} was used to access {{numOfMachines}} machines, although this account is not managed in CyberArk PAS.
UNMANAGED.RECOMMENDATION: QQOConsider provisioning the unmanaged privileged account in CyberArk PAS.

VAULT_IRREGULAR_IP.TITLE: QQOPrivileged access to the Vault from irregular IP
VAULT_IRREGULAR_IP.SUBTITLE:
QQOVault user {{user}} accessed the Vault from irregular IP {{source}}.
This action was flagged as a security event because {{user}} does not normally access the Vault from this IP.
VAULT_IRREGULAR_IP.RECOMMENDATION: QQOReview this Vault user’s activities and ensure that they are valid.

DASHBOARD.ERROR_MESSAGE: QQOServer error has occurred, please try again later
